response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you might be different. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose a price of $12,000 for it. I believe this offers a fair compromise between its value to me and its perceived value to you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making an offer.", "product_price": 12000}
